PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-13492008-07-28,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActExcise Tax Act
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE AUTOMOBILE OPERATING EXPENSE BENEFIT (GST/HST) REGULATIONS to ensure that the appropriate amount of GST/HST in remitted in respect of automobile operating expenses paid by an employer or corporation and incurred in relation to the personal use of an automobile by an employee or shareholder.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2008-0237 Publication Date: 2008-08-06
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: REGULATIONS AMENDING THE AUTOMOBILE OPERATING EXPENSE BENEFIT (GST/HST) REGULATIONS to ensure that the appropriate amount of GST/HST in remitted in respect of automobile operating expenses paid by an employer or corporation and incurred in relation to the personal use of an automobile by an employee or shareholder.
